snippet: The Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis said hackers were able to redirect users of its online research services to fake websites.
abstract: Federal Reserve Bank of St Louis acknowledges successful cyberattack, saying hackers redirected users of its online research services to fake websites; breach is only latest to affect government systems.

byline.contributor: Binyamin Appelbaum contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis said hackers were able to redirect users of its online research services to fake websites.

headline.main: Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis Confirms a Hacker Attack
headline.print_headline: Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis Confirms a Hacker Attack
